data.name: 0000 (370.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I'm honestly worried about leaving Haruhi to investigate alone.

data.name: 0001 (370.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Though, if we have a lot of people asking questions, we might find something useful.

data.name: 0002 (370.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: That's why I thought we all, minus Haruhi, should pay the computer folks a surprise visit.

data.name: 0003 (370.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: You guys again…

data.name: 0004 (370.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Fortunately, our SOS Brigade leader, Haruhi Suzumiya, isn't here.

data.name: 0005 (370.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: The club president's attitude seems to have softened.

data.name: 0006 (370.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Though, he's not exactly giving us a warm welcome.

data.name: 0008 (370.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: We heard that the Computer Society has been camping at school for a while.

data.name: 0009 (370.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Ah… And?

data.name: 0010 (370.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: That passion is truly wonderful. I'd definitely love to learn from your extreme level of focus.

data.name: 0011 (370.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Koizumi immediately started working his communication skills.

data.name: 0012 (370.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Huh? Yeah, well, these are our club activities so we need to make sure we produce results.

data.name: 0013 (370.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Results? Are you creating some kind of program?

data.name: 0014 (370.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Yeah. We can't tell you the details, but we're creating a game for the school festival.

data.name: 0015 (370.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Thanks to Koizumi, the club president seems to have conveniently loosened his lips.

data.name: 0017 (370.ja) CLUB_MEM_B (部員Ｂ)
data.value: Prez! I can't find the memory card with our data on it!

data.name: 0018 (370.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Ehh… That's not good…

data.name: 0019 (370.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Maybe you left it in the computer room?

data.name: 0020 (370.ja) CLUB_MEM_B (部員Ｂ)
data.value: That's terrible! What if someone were to find it…

data.name: 0021 (370.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Shh! We can talk about that stuff later!

data.name: 0023 (370.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: The club president's face went stiff. Is the data that important?

data.name: 0024 (370.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Based on what you're saying, you've lost the data you were creating?

data.name: 0025 (370.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Ahh… Yeah, something like that.

data.name: 0026 (370.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: That sounds quite serious…

data.name: 0027 (370.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: It's a bit troubling.

data.name: 0028 (370.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: But we'll find it, I think. We had it very recently and stuff.

data.name: 0029 (370.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: The club president seemed put at ease by Koizumi's dubious attempt to feign sympathy.

data.name: 0032 (370.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Meanwhile, with the SOS Brigade's idol, Asahina…

data.name: 0033 (370.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: U-Um, this is a wonderful image.

data.name: 0034 (370.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: Right? We're really proud of it.

data.name: 0035 (370.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: She's been captured by the Computer Society members.

data.name: 0036 (370.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: #DP

data.name: 0038 (370.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Nagato is hard to approach and doesn't talk, so she's been more or less abandoned.

data.name: 0039 (370.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: You know, when I was putting up these posters…

data.name: 0040 (370.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: I actually had a mysterious experience.

data.name: 0041 (370.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I-Is it scary?

data.name: 0042 (370.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Scaring Asahina is absolutely forbidden.

data.name: 0043 (370.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: Nah, it's more like a mysterious experience than something scary.

data.name: 0044 (370.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Wh-What kind of experience?

data.name: 0045 (370.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Asahina is humbly investigating despite being terrified…

data.name: 0046 (370.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: From the bottom of my heart, I am moved. Everyone should learn from her incredible courage.

data.name: 0047 (370.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: I was putting up posters near 1-9, but the corridor felt long all of a sudden…

data.name: 0048 (370.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: So it was there after all, huh?

data.name: 0049 (370.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: I thought maybe I was just hallucinating from the fatigue of doing all nighters.

data.name: 0050 (370.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Th-Then what happened?

data.name: 0051 (370.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: I went far down the corridor, turned around, and I saw the class 1-10 plate.

data.name: 0052 (370.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Stooop, that's scaaary!

data.name: 0053 (370.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: …… You are safe.

data.name: 0054 (370.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: If someone's going to hug her, I'd rather do it myself instead of Nagato…

data.name: 0055 (370.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: So, what were the posters?

data.name: 0056 (370.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: Well, they were these.

data.name: 0057 (370.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Uhh… I can't quite tell what's written on this…

data.name: 0058 (370.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: The student council asked us to make these to raise awareness for water conservation…

data.name: 0059 (370.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: We thought it'd be boring to just write "water conservation", so we've put our own spin on it.

data.name: 0060 (370.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: If putting your own spin on it makes it incomprehensible, then what's the point?

data.name: 0061 (370.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: So, what is written on it?

data.name: 0062 (370.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: H2O, the chemical formula of water.

data.name: 0064 (370.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: No matter how I try to read it, I can't see it. The 2 in particular is too "Decadence."

data.name: 0065 (370.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Even when you tell me what it says, I can't read it. I'm not sure how I feel about that.

data.name: 0066 (370.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: Isn't it cool? We poured our heart and soul into it.

data.name: 0067 (370.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Is this 2 some kind of misprint or a mistake?

data.name: 0068 (370.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I'm being smug, but it's probably best to let them know about the misprint.

data.name: 0069 (370.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I don't mean to get in your way, but isn't this a misprint?

data.name: 0070 (370.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: Of course not. How rude…

data.name: 0071 (370.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: But look, this doesn't look like a 2.

data.name: 0072 (370.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: You're right. It's hard to read.

data.name: 0073 (370.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: Huh, maybe it is…?

data.name: 0074 (370.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Look, it doesn't look like it says H2O.

data.name: 0075 (370.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: Oh, you're right…

data.name: 0077 (370.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: … The font is misshapen.

data.name: 0078 (370.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: Y-you're right!

data.name: 0079 (370.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: You discount it when I say it, but believe Asahina and Nagato when they say so?

data.name: 0080 (370.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: … Well, I suppose I can't blame you when you're dealing with Asahina.

data.name: 0081 (370.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: You can't even call it a 2. It's way too big, for example.

data.name: 0082 (370.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: … No kidding.

data.name: 0083 (370.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: Thanks a lot. If you didn't tell us, we wouldn't have noticed. There's no doubt about it.

data.name: 0084 (370.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: I can't imagine the shame we would've faced if classes started without us noticing the error.

data.name: 0085 (370.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Would've been fine with just "Save Water," but they went elaborate and missed the point.

data.name: 0086 (370.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: Thank you, truly. I'd better go take them down and redo them.

data.name: 0087 (370.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It seems like pointing out the #P05misprint#P01 was a good idea.

data.name: 0088 (370.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: We should get going and fix the design.

data.name: 0090 (370.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I could point it out, but there's that old saying, "a small kindness is a huge nuisance."

data.name: 0091 (370.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It's a nonsensical proverb, but for now I'll shut up and let it slide.

data.name: 0092 (370.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: Hey, don't you think it's cool?

data.name: 0094 (370.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: You can't expect Nagato to point out your mistakes or give a friendly response, I'm afraid.

data.name: 0095 (370.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: Look, it's cool, right?

data.name: 0096 (370.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: S-Sure it is!

data.name: 0097 (370.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Ahhh. Asahina IS like an angel, after all.

data.name: 0098 (370.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: As a fellow man, I know being shamed in front of Asahina feels unbearable.

data.name: 0099 (370.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I'll keep that #P05small kindness#P01 stowed away in my mind.

data.name: 0102 (370.ja) CLUB_MEM_C (部員Ｃ)
data.value: You guys don't need to stand there. Take some chairs and we'll even make you tea.

data.name: 0103 (370.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Oh, if we're having tea, then I can…

data.name: 0104 (370.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Having an unconditional reaction to tea… Oh Asahina, I could cry.

data.name: 0105 (370.ja) CLUB_MEM_C (部員Ｃ)
data.value: Don't worry about it! As guests, you should just sit and wait.

data.name: 0106 (370.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Well I never. The service is on another level when you bring Asahina with you, huh.

data.name: 0107 (370.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I'm being treated as a guest. If I came with Haruhi, this reception would be unthinkable.

data.name: 0108 (370.ja) CLUB_MEM_C (部員Ｃ)
data.value: Would cold tea be okay for the two of you?

data.name: 0109 (370.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Oi, you're not forgetting about me, are you? Guys are excluded from the service?

data.name: 0110 (370.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Thank you so much. I'm just happy to have anything.

data.name: 0111 (370.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: … Thank you.

data.name: 0112 (370.ja) CLUB_MEM_C (部員Ｃ)
data.value: Ehehe… It's so nice. I'm so jealous you have girls in your club.

data.name: 0113 (370.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I-Is that right…

data.name: 0114 (370.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: If you're fine with Haruhi, it's my pleasure, though rejection is, of course, guaranteed.

data.name: 0115 (370.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: In any case, I was right to bring Asahina and Nagato.

data.name: 0117 (370.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Quite the peaceful atmosphere, don't you think?

data.name: 0118 (370.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Right. I'll just give you the credit.

data.name: 0119 (370.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I believe it is our female camp that deserves the credit.

data.name: 0120 (370.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Since I was just thinking about how effective they were, I'll have to agree with Koizumi.

data.name: 0122 (370.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: I thought you were members of a dodgy interest society, but…

data.name: 0123 (370.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: You're surprisingly… normal people.

data.name: 0124 (370.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: This guy really said that "surprisingly" to our face?

data.name: 0125 (370.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Suzumiya is also a lovely person to spend time with. Why don't you try talking to her once?

data.name: 0126 (370.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I want to know where you have to press Haruhi to be able to say she's a lovely person.

data.name: 0127 (370.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: W-Well, I'll pass on that. Just, make yourself at home.

data.name: 0128 (370.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I truly believe you've made the correct, healthy choice.

data.name: 0131 (370.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Peacefully enjoying ourselves is great and all, but what about the questioning?

data.name: 0132 (370.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Without any conclusive information, we'll have no way of stopping Haruhi's rampage.

data.name: 0133 (370.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: How about I try asking someone…?

data.name: 0134 (370.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Have you gained any information chatting with our friends from the Computer Society?

data.name: 0135 (370.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: No particularly beneficial information has been obtained.

data.name: 0136 (370.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Right…

data.name: 0137 (370.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: From her perspective, it's probably just trivial information that she already knows.

data.name: 0138 (370.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Instead of information, I received this.

data.name: 0139 (370.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What's this?

data.name: 0140 (370.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: The exterior is alpha glucose from wheat.

data.name: 0141 (370.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: The inside is an amino acid compound with dietary fibre from beans. It's mainly sucrose.

data.name: 0142 (370.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Uh, that's a standard "manju," right?

data.name: 0143 (370.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Right.

data.name: 0144 (370.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Whilst saying so, she handed me the manju.

data.name: 0145 (370.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Wait, what do you want me to do with it?

data.name: 0146 (370.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Take it.

data.name: 0147 (370.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: You're giving it to me?

data.name: 0148 (370.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Yes.

data.name: 0149 (370.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I got a souvenir from Nagato.

data.name: 0150 (370.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hey, thanks.

data.name: 0151 (370.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: You can have some later, if you get hungry.

data.name: 0153 (370.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Nagato nodded silently.

data.name: 0154 (370.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Is she trying to give this to me as a substitute for information?

data.name: 0156 (370.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Did you get any interesting information, Asahina?

data.name: 0157 (370.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I did… but it was scary and I couldn't listen properly…

data.name: 0158 (370.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I heard a terrible story that when this building was put up, they put up a human pillar.

data.name: 0159 (370.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: A human pillar? Maybe in an Edo period castle, but this is modern architecture.

data.name: 0160 (370.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: That's just a standard myth.

data.name: 0161 (370.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Really…? That's a relief.

data.name: 0162 (370.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: How dare you go off telling #P05scary stories#P00 to Asahina, trying to scare her…

data.name: 0163 (370.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Even though Haruhi would be overjoyed to hear it, it's not enough.

data.name: 0165 (370.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Did you hear anything interesting?

data.name: 0166 (370.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Indeed. I heard some deeply interesting things from the club president.

data.name: 0167 (370.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What things?

data.name: 0168 (370.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Mainly about computers, but regarding the link between the phenomena and electronics…

data.name: 0169 (370.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: … What?

data.name: 0170 (370.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I got to hear the president's theory.

data.name: 0171 (370.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What's that?

data.name: 0172 (370.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: It's about how in TV ghost specials, the video or audio suddenly goes strange.

data.name: 0173 (370.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: That's just an act to hide scenes they don't want you to see, right?

data.name: 0174 (370.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: A different perspective. Your explanation is lacking in imagination or fun, is it not?

data.name: 0175 (370.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I'm sorry… for being a man of no imagination.

data.name: 0176 (370.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: The theory was about a connection with electromagnetic radiation.

data.name: 0177 (370.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: It doesn't mean anything to me.

data.name: 0178 (370.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: No matter what, when the club members experienced the unnatural phenomena…

data.name: 0179 (370.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: They could all say with certainty, that…

data.name: 0180 (370.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: The computers weren't working properly.

data.name: 0181 (370.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Is that why they think there's a link with "electromagnetic radiation?"

data.name: 0182 (370.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: That's what I was told.

data.name: 0183 (370.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I don't believe it. I expected the club president to be more rational.

data.name: 0184 (370.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Indeed. I think it's quite interesting.

data.name: 0185 (370.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It's kinda lacking in the realism I think we'd need to convince Haruhi, but…

data.name: 0187 (370.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Well, we've more or less heard everything. Probably best we got moving.

data.name: 0188 (370.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Quite. I'm sure Suzumiya is probably finishing her investigation too.

data.name: 0189 (370.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Thank you very much for the tea.

data.name: 0190 (370.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: … Thank you.

data.name: 0191 (370.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Well, we didn't really get anything useful, but--

data.name: 0192 (370.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Somehow or another, we were able to hear about their experience with class 1-10.

data.name: 0193 (370.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Then, if you'll excuse us.

data.name: 0196 (370.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: The problem now is where to go from here.

data.name: 0197 (370.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Could I borrow some of your time?

data.name: 0198 (370.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: What's with that tone of voice, like a suspicious preacher calling to a passerby?

data.name: 0199 (370.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I got hold of something interesting, and wanted to inform you.

data.name: 0200 (370.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What's so interesting?

data.name: 0201 (370.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: This.

data.name: 0202 (370.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: A memory card?

data.name: 0203 (370.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I was wondering if this might have the game the club president was just talking about on it.

data.name: 0204 (370.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: … I've quietly borrowed it.

data.name: 0205 (370.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hey now, that's no good at all…

data.name: 0206 (370.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: All I did was pick it up. It was dropped on the floor.

data.name: 0207 (370.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Even so, taking it with you is definitely no good.

data.name: 0208 (370.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Of course, I'll return it to them later, or are you saying I should give it straight back?

data.name: 0209 (370.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: You're speaking as if you're implying something, so do you have some kind of idea?

data.name: 0210 (370.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: If this does contain the game that the club president was talking about…

data.name: 0211 (370.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Then, what?

data.name: 0212 (370.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Don't you think it might interest Suzumiya?

data.name: 0213 (370.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: … You're thinking we should use this to distract Haruhi from the new seven wonders?

data.name: 0214 (370.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Quite so. I wouldn't have taken it with me otherwise.

data.name: 0215 (370.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I see…

data.name: 0216 (370.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Certainly, as Koizumi says, it would do us good to divert Haruhi's attention to this, but…

data.name: 0217 (370.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: We can't say for sure that she'll care about it.

data.name: 0218 (370.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Maybe if we return it, we can get some useful information from them…

data.name: 0219 (370.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: What do you think?

data.name: 0220 (370.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Well…

data.name: 0221 (370.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I feel sorry for the club president, but how about we borrow it for while?

data.name: 0222 (370.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Understood. Then I shall leave this data with you.

data.name: 0223 (370.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Is it really okay for me to have this #P05memory card#P00?

data.name: 0224 (370.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: It is. Make sure to use it some time.

data.name: 0225 (370.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I hope that "some time" never comes.

data.name: 0226 (370.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Of course.

data.name: 0227 (370.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Do you really think so, Koizumi?

data.name: 0228 (370.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Wouldn't it be best for me to quietly return this?

data.name: 0229 (370.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: You're quite the honest person, aren't you.

data.name: 0230 (370.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I'm fully aware that I look like an idiot.

data.name: 0231 (370.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: If I'm going to draw the short end of the stick either way, I might as well be honest.

data.name: 0232 (370.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I see. How very like you.

data.name: 0233 (370.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Why do I feel like I'm being made fun of?

data.name: 0234 (370.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Then, I'll just leave this memory card in the corridor.

data.name: 0235 (370.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: You won't go to return it?

data.name: 0236 (370.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: It'd be awkward if I go to return it saying it was dropped, and arouse suspicion.

data.name: 0237 (370.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Hey, you're making me feel awkward now, Koizumi!

data.name: 0238 (370.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Then I'll just place it h… Oh?

data.name: 0239 (370.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It's like Koizumi found something when he bent down to place the memory card on the floor.

data.name: 0240 (370.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: To think something like this would be dropped here.

data.name: 0241 (370.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What is that?

data.name: 0242 (370.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: It looks like a toy sheep, but… Is it out of battery? It doesn't seem like it works.

data.name: 0243 (370.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: An #P05electric sheep#P00, huh…? Doesn't seem like it's of any use to us at all.

data.name: 0245 (370.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Wow! A cute sheep!

data.name: 0246 (370.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: If it makes Asahina happy, it's probably worth taking. That being said…

data.name: 0247 (370.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It's painful to try to comprehend why something like this would be dropped here.

data.name: 0248 (370.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Shall we meet up with Haruhi, then?

data.name: 0249 (370.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: For the time being, we don't have a choice but to make do with what information we have.

data.name: 0250 (370.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Inform of the misprint

data.name: 0251 (370.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Say nothing

data.name: 0252 (370.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Ask Nagato

data.name: 0253 (370.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Ask Mikuru

data.name: 0254 (370.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Ask Koizumi

data.name: 0255 (370.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Borrow it.

data.name: 0256 (370.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Quietly return it
